name: Bullet Monkey
description:
This is a short and simple game made for GBJAM 8. Collect fruits and dodge hazards. Last till the of the timer to move on to the next level. Complete all levels to win!

  • 4 levels
  • 3 enemy types
Controls

UP - Jump/Double jump

LEFT/RIGHT - Move left and right

Cut Features

I planned to have a hard cutoff 2 days before the jam ended, so I rapidly cut features to "finish".

Here was what was cut due to time constraints:

  • Platforming - had occasional collision bugs, so this was disabled in code
  • Stage hazards -  worked but didn't make sense without platforming
  • Items
  • Score combo
  • Animations
  • Particles
Credits

Colour palette: Ice Cream GB by Kerrie Lake

All code and assets were authored by me using the tools below.
